metadata.title: CVE-2022-29537 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: gp_rtp_builder_do_hevc in ietf/rtp_pck_mpeg4.c in GPAC 2.0.0 has aheap-based buffer over-read, as demonstrated by MP4Box.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
